headline: DATAPAQ TP3000A
specstable:
Manufacturer Datapaq
Model TP3000A
Description Furnace Temperature Profiling System
Accessories

Cassette for alkaline batteries

Thermal barrier model TB5011B

USB cable

Datapaq Insight Tracker software available, please inquire

Other Information
  • Thermal barrier:

7.7"W X 15.1"L X 1.6"H, 6.6 lbs, temperature duration @100C (212F) 2.5 hrs, @200C (392F) 40 min

  • Data Logger:

3.6 million data-points;

10 channels for type K thermocouples (thermocouples not included);

Measurement range: -190C to 1370C (-310F to 2500F);

Operating range (logger internal temperature): −40°C to 55°C (−40°F to 131°F);

Accuracy: ±0.3°C/0.5°F

Power source: Alkaline batteries, 450 hours;

USB power: Logger is powered by USB when connected;

Sample Intervals:

  • 1–3 channels 0.1 s to 50 min.
  • 4–9 channels 0.2 s to 50 min.
  • 10 channels 0.3 s to 50 min.

Data-collection start:
No trigger, Start button, Date and time, Rising temperature, Falling temperature.

Pre-trigger data stored: configurable;
Multiple runs: Collect data from up to 10 runs before downloading;
Multiple events: Up to 10 events (different probes, sample intervals and trigger modes for different stages of a profile run;
Communications: USB 2.0, Mini-B socket.


For more information: www.flukeprocessinstruments.com

Extended Description Details at TP3_TB5011.PDF
Exterior Dimensions
Width 3.800 in (9.7 cm)
Depth 7.800 in (19.8 cm)
Height 0.800 in (2.0 cm)
